title: Google Pixel 2 touchscreen was unresponsive even after factory reset. Please help.
content:
Hi All, 

Google Pixel 2 was charging overnight. The touchscreen became unresponsive.

I booted it up into safe mode - didn't work.

I factory reset it - didn't work. 

I never had issues with the phone before. I believe there was an update recently. I do not have a screen protector and the screen is not cracked nor has the phone been near any water. 

Any help would be welcome. Thanks!
